node.title: Building Map, Filter, and Reduce in C++ with Templates and Iterators
node.description: For funsies, let's implement JavaScript's Map(), Filter(), and Reduce() in C++.

node.title: Bit Twiddling in JavaScript
node.description: Recently, I came across a fun C++ challenge to count the number of set bits in an integer.  Spending a lot of time in the browser, I wanted to re-implement it in JavaScript.

node.title: 🎉 A new blog for a new year
node.description: As part of my pending New Year's resolutions, I decided that I wanted to do more technical writing.  So, as a means to an end, I created a lightweight blog and accompanying content management system (CMS).
